notes.text:
This update for libarchive fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-26280: Fixed out-of-bounds read via the component zipx_lzma_alone_init (bsc#1197634).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Libarchive v3.6.0 was discovered to contain an out-of-bounds read via the component zipx_lzma_alone_init.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
